website_summaries.verdict: An ergonomic, easy-to-use rotary egg beater that glides smoothly and won't slip from your hand.
pros: Beaters are elevated so they work even while the device rests on the bottom of the bowl
cons: A few have complained that the pieces shrunk when put in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Egg Beater with a Fatal Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I loved this egg beater and bought some as a gift for relatives. However, they all befell the same fate after a few months if light use due to a structural weakness in the design. See photo that shows where these all eventually break. I tried repairing with some Testors plastic glue, but the point that the break occurs is too thin to adequately repair. It is a shame that these all have this design flaw, because it is otherwise the best egg beater there is. I look forward to a newer model where Oxo works out this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Zunderman

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as dishwasher safe. They aren't. The bottom part actually shrank and no longer fits the top. Typical lousy product from this company. I've gone back to a metal one.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Started off nice but didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Oxo brand for their durability, however 5 months after using it fairly regularly (love homemade whip cream in my coffee) and solely hand wash since we do not own a dish washer. The plastic part supporting the metal whisks broke. For the cost and brand reputation this turned out to be a dud. Sad because I really liked that the handle pops off for easy cleaning and the upright handle is comfortable. I’m switching to an all stainless steel manual blender, I prefer it to buying more electric gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Dias

customer_reviews.title: Loved Till It SHRUNK
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED everything about this and the fact that it came apart and was dishwasher safe. That made it 5 stars.. But I pulled it out of the dishwasher this morning to discover that part that detaches and goes into the dishwasher SHRUNK and now will not reattach to the part which spins. Making it completely unusable. I used it twice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Weak, wimpy, easily broken
customer_reviews.text: The second one of these mixers I purchased just broke today while I was mixing some eggs. When the first one broke I figured I was just using too much muscle on it. I bought a second one, and was careful with it. I think this thing needs to be in a play cook set for little girls, not in a real kitchen being used by grownups.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: I think I could start the car with this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This is one bad-a** egg beater. My mom has had the same egg beater for 60 years that she got as part of kitchen set as a wedding gift. Up until now, I thought that was the most durable beater, then I used this sweet baby. It's like beating eggs with a 10-speed bike set to the highest gear. The beaters pop out with the press of a button for easy cleaning. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gussert

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use the OXO egg beater for a while before reviewing. I've used a traditional egg beater for many years and when it was time to replace mine I decided to give this one a try. I like OXO products and this one is no exception. I don't put it in the dishwasher after reading reviews by others, but there's no need to because it's so easy to clean. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: JNell

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better handle
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the wife, and just used it yesterday myself. I really do like that the beater mechanism detaches from the handle for washing, however, the handle is not well suited for this purpose. It takes a very tight grip to keep it from moving while turning the crank. The traditional "D" shaped handle provides much better support.
customer_reviews.author: xyz

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for quick light jobs, eggs or whipped ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for quick light jobs, eggs or whipped cream. It is difficult to remove the beater piece to wash, hence a 3!
customer_reviews.author: KAD

customer_reviews.title: The design of the grip makes it comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: The design of the grip makes it comfortable to hold. The rotary handle doesn't rotate smoothly. The removable beaters is a good feature, making it easy to clean and store. The main issue is the beaters are wires, not blades, so they work more like a whip rather than like beaters. It takes a lot of rotations to beat eggs because the beaters don't grab the egg yolks and pull them through, like a beater would. The quality of the material is not great, it's adequate. For the price, I was expecting more.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Six years in and I'm still loving it.
customer_reviews.text: Mixes well, cleans up easily. I've owned several hand beaters over 40+ years of marriage, and washing this one is not the pain that all the rest were. Remove the end by depressing two buttons, and either put into the dishwasher or the sink. The handle end remains pristine, and harsh dishwasher detergent won't degrade the upper portion's grippy surface.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bitney

customer_reviews.title: starts skipping after a while so does not beat.
customer_reviews.text: This was great at first, and is easy to hold and easy to clean. But after less than a year (and we don't use it that often) it started "skipping" so that even though I was turning the handle, the metal beating part did not move. Then it would start again and then stop again. This has become more frequent. So now I am thinking I need to get one of the old-fashioned egg beaters again, that work no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: charliegg

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTING...
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of all things OXO but not this egg beater. I have OA in my hands and thought this would be easier than others but alas, it is not. It spins easily and is easy to take apart and clean, however the “handle” on top, which is not really a handle at all, is very hard to clutch if your hands are balky. I find the whole design challenging and less than satisfactory. Would I buy it again? No. UPDATE AFTER JUST A FEW MONTHS... am finally giving this away and getting a new one - actually an old fashioned one with a regular handle on top. This is impossible to grasp if you have OA.
customer_reviews.author: LW Raboys

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with no electricity !
customer_reviews.text: There are so many occasions that I need to beat some eggs but do not want to get out the electric mixer. This is just perfect. It fits in the drawer, is lightweight, and cleans up by just putting it in the dishwasher. I have severe arthritis and cannot manage some tools. This is easy and comfortable to use. The attachment to the handle seems a little loose at times, but has not come apart in use. I probably did not have it clicked into place. Compared to grandma's old hand beater, this is so much easier and easier to clean. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SGB

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Easy to clean. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this made me want to ditch my small electric mixer. So easy to use and clean and does a great job of blending. I used ot today to beat a couple of eggs for pancake batter. So much cleaner then a wire whisk. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandralee

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love this!
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe the quality of this hand mixer! I bought it as a prepping item for if the SHTF and we had no power. However, I find myself using it as my preferred method of mixing! It is especially great for beating eggs. The operation is super smooth and easy to operate and it has far exceeded my every expectation.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Best egg beater on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Good Grip beater. I put the first one thru alot and it finally said enough. Bought the traditional egg beater because I couldn't find the Good Grip Egg Beater locally. Hated the traditional one and finally broke down and looked for the Good Grip Beater. So glad I did. Easy to clean. The open beaters allow the addition of things like nuts and flavored chips. Would recommend it to anyone. Bought one for a friend after she lost her home to fire. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta L.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, easy to use and clean and a great ergonomic design.
customer_reviews.text: I own electric beaters but this is my go to. These are my 2nd set, my 1st lasted 5+ years of constant use. Strong, easy to use and clean and a great ergonomic design.
customer_reviews.author: Ben eva

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works great
customer_reviews.text: We live off-grid so we don’t like having a bunch of power sucking kitchen appliances but we like to cook and needed something more powerful than a hand whisk. Amazed that we were able to make whipped cream with this. Everything pops off to make cleaning easier. Handle is comfortable and operation is pretty smooth and not too difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Joi maree freeman

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to make them but works well
customer_reviews.text: I would probably give this a 3.5 if I had the chance. I don't like the all plastic construction. But because of that, I have taken precautions when washing, well, in fact I don't wash. I just rinse it very well right away after each use and avoid the dishwasher. I don't anticipate it will have a long shelf life with the plastic construction, but works well for now at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Larson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this beater !!!
customer_reviews.text: More than 50 years of cooking from scratch, and this is the best hand crank beater I have ever used ! I will be purchasing extras !
customer_reviews.author: La Tri

customer_reviews.title: The best I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this egg beater so much that I ordered it as a replacement for the previous one. I think I had the first beater for about five years and one day it fell apart. I didn't want to return for repair, if that is even possible, but opted to just purchase a new one. I like the handle and the ease of operation. For me, I would probably replace this thing every year if I had to. I like it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Ed A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality Hand Mixer
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have one of these...order one! Best little (non electric) hand mixer to have. With storms knocking out power this little hand mixer is a gem, easy to use, easy to clean and mixes really well, and cranks smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: susan m harnan

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: This egg beater does what it's supposed to do. It will work in a small mixing bowl or a larger one. It actually is easier to operate than one from the 1950s, it's smoother and doesn't hang up or rust.
customer_reviews.author: Coochinski

customer_reviews.title: love it overall-bigger button needed
customer_reviews.text: I love this overall, it is easy, no cord to wrap up and easy to use, works wonderfully. ONLY COMPLAINT- the button to release the metal mixers for cleaning is so tiny that even a toddler would have a hard time pushing it. You have to push it in quite far to get them to release, so it is hard to take apart to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J Bailey

customer_reviews.title: This worked wonderfully, but the first time we washed the beater ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonderfully, but the first time we washed the beater part in the dishwasher (as is stated can be done) it deformed and no longer fits on the top part, and no replacement parts are available for purchase so the whole thing is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sergio Serrano

customer_reviews.title: trash
customer_reviews.text: This item is not returnable. It is less effective than a whisk and has no blending power. I regret buying it. It does not work and handwashing is a pain. It also is uncomfortable to hold and use. The handle is large and vibrates a lot. The crank is tiny and puts a lot of stress on the thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle O.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Oxo Egg Beater!
customer_reviews.text: Finally replaced my old rusted hand beater. Now I realize how much I missed it. I love scrambled eggs and it does a better job of beating the eggs than a fork. The Oxo beaters can be used for light batters too. Even mixed up some instant pudding for my husband. Easy to clean since the beaters separate from the handle. Thanks Oxo for another great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane McCall

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: So handy when you don’t want to use an electric mixer. What I like about this design is the beaters disconnect from the handle for easy cleaning or to put in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: E-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: Liked the design and it worked good for a few months and then it came apart and I couldn't get it to connect again. Should have lasted longer than the 6 months it did. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C. Viands

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my brother in Florida since he uses a rotating mixer to blend his scrambled eggs and I bought one for myself because I thought it was absolutely fantastic. Works great easy to hold doesn't break your arm.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: OXO Egg Beater
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this egg beater for my wife. Obviously it was her who could not wait to try it and she loves it. First question she asked me was did I notice how much fluffer the eggs were. Eggs are eggs to me but they did look different. I guess fluffy if that made her happy! If my wife likes the egg beater then that is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Attardo

customer_reviews.title: Works well but breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this twice. When it broke the first time, I hoped it was just a flawed item. It was so comfortable to hold and whisked so well, I took a chance on another...which broke faster than the first one. I didn't use it for anything heavy, and didn't put it in the dishwasher. Time to find a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda S. Mckinnon

customer_reviews.title: Handy little beater.
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy. I do t have to get out my mixer to beat a small amount of batter or an egg.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2015 and it worked fine. The other day though, one of the cheap plastic brackets that holds in the (removable) whisk/beaters simply split off, leaving that beater to slide out of place. It will still work if you hold the unsupported beater in place with your finger. But really, I think I prefer the all-metal eggbeater that my mom bought in 1953, used throughout my childhood, and then gave to me--it did give up, in 2015, but only because the melamine handle disintegrate--it actually still works fine (and of course the beaters stay well in place).
customer_reviews.author: Do_not_track

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for cleaning and a quick beating tool
customer_reviews.text: The wires are small - good for cutting through things but not as effective as the old style mixers. It does fine for eggs and light mixing though. Coming apart makes it a breeze to clean but not sure it is necessary for my light needs.
customer_reviews.author: gbdusmc

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than the old electric one, it's easy to use and easy to clean. My 15 year old son has used it several times and says it's "cool" because he can control how fast it beats and doesn't use electricity. This is very practical.
customer_reviews.author: DavidRinLincoln

customer_reviews.title: another solid OXO kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to hold. Beaters snap off and can be easily washed in the dishwasher. I've had mine for a couple years and still works like new.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Great for beating eggs but flimsy for anything thicker
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this to whip up eggs in the morning. It works super well but it will break after a few years, especially if you use it on anything thicker than eggs or whipping cream. We love this product so much that we don’t mind replacing it every few years but keep that in mind if you order this.
customer_reviews.author: CatKendrick

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this little egg beater!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best egg beater that I have ever used. My husband and I both love it and it's the first thing we reach for. It works like a dream and is very easy to clean! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Temple

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Mixing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean; works well. Use only -- as directed -- for lightweight mixing, like eggs, etc. Doesn't work well for thick items like whipped cream cheese. Good product for it's use.
customer_reviews.author: Tailored Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A must for every kitchen. Super fast delivery. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute best hand mixer on the market. Light weight and easy to clean. Every kitchen should have this item. Ordered for my sisters and going to reorder for other family members. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Smcclain

customer_reviews.title: loved this egg beater
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this egg beater 4/8/2020. Today it literally fell apart in use beating eggs. The plastic parts that hold the beater into the base section are thin and weak in design. Loved it till that but it didn't last long enough to rate more than 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Throwback!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Whips the best scrambled eggs ever! At Christmastime, my son in law”s grandmother wanted to take them home with her! To her surprise, my husband had ordered another, which was shelved in our pantry. YES- brand new! He gifted it to “Oma-ma” She was delighted! The BEST gift of Christmas!!! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Prefer it over my electric mixer
customer_reviews.text: Works great for mixing thinner mixes, and fairly comfortable to hold. It comes apart easily to hand wash, and I like that the handle assembly can separated from the beaters. ’ve only used it a few times, so I can’t speak for its durability, but thus far I prefer it over pulling out my electric mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Kokochi World

customer_reviews.title: My foodie housemate....
customer_reviews.text: loves this product. So convenient over a corded mixer. Very smooth operation, and super easy to clean. Everything I expect from an OXO product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gloria

customer_reviews.title: OXO does it again!
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of scrambled eggs, french toast, etc for my grandkids and this tool is perfect for really frothing up those eggs! Beating the eggs with a fork isn't thorough enough for me. I can always rely on OXO to make the right tool for the job. This beater is easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Keen Green

customer_reviews.title: Typically good product from OXO
customer_reviews.text: This is quite different from my old egg beater, but I've never been disappointed by OXO. I've only used this a couple of times, but my first opinions are positive. Easy to hold and turn. Beats up eggs well. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great when you wash by hand!
customer_reviews.text: I wash by hand every morning - no problem with expanding plastic when you don't put it in the dishwasher. We use it to mix scrambled eggs - does a wonderful job!
customer_reviews.author: T. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Love this beater
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and clean. Breaks down in half to fit in narrow drawer. Beats well. Nice looking. All in all, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. If you are beating a lot of eggs, this is perfect. It reminds me of my grandmother’s and my mother’s egg beater. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our old egg beater broke and I purchased this to replace it. Works fantastic! Very easy to turn the handle, quiet, and beats much better then the conventional egg beaters. Also easy to clean. Extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: L.wright

customer_reviews.title: Best beater
customer_reviews.text: The best. Don’t know how I lived without it. Has been using old school steel one and cleaning that one was awful. This one is a breeze and it blends/beats eggs better than any. So glad I splurged.
customer_reviews.author: J. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Eggcellent.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Egg Beaters ever. Hand wash if you want them to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: darcy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It works just as good as the electric one, but without needing electricity. Everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 6yo as she loves to make scrambled eggs. Works great for eggs and pancakes. A bit heavy though
customer_reviews.author: MPAdams

customer_reviews.title: this works fine
customer_reviews.text: old style mixer, works good for the small jobs I have, since I'm only preparing food for 1.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tirebiter

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: My son loved playing with my first one of these as he broke it (after about 6 months of very rough playing with it) so I finally replaced it and I use it all the time Perfect for beating eggs or any sort of liquid ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.

customer_reviews.title: Good beater
customer_reviews.text: So far used them about 5 times, and liking them more each time. Beat very well, easy to turn. The vertical handle gets tiring but is not painful to hold. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: cat mom 4

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: Oxo egg beater is easy to handle and takes up less space in the drawer. Ergonomic design makes use easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jennine Porta

customer_reviews.title: We'll hope for the best.
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as strong or smooth as the several-year-old OXO beater it replaced. We'll hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: egreetham

customer_reviews.title: Trusty pal.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beater, easy to use, easy to clean. A simple, no-nonsense design that has had some nicely modernized tweaks made to it, making a tried-and-true kitchen tool even better.
customer_reviews.author: Penthesilea

customer_reviews.title: The perfect egg beater!
customer_reviews.text: This works so well and is so easy to hold! Just wish it had sturdier blades so I could do more with it than just beat eggs or whip cream.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! So fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: I only hand wash mine from reading other reviews. BUT let me tell you this has changed eggs forever for me. So helpful and FAST. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley pipher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: So easy to clean. Come apart & goes back together very easily!’
customer_reviews.author: Lovelabbies

customer_reviews.title: GReaT LiL KiTCheN TooL
customer_reviews.text: Sooo MuCH FuN MiXiN' STuFF!!! Easy to clean, the end just pops right off. LoVe iT.
customer_reviews.author: 💜ALiSiN💜

customer_reviews.title: Great egg beater.
customer_reviews.text: Like this so much my son wanted one to take to college.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the draws space
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how often I reach for this. So easy to use, works very well for eggs, whipped cream, batters, etc
customer_reviews.author: Needs and editor, fact checker and new author!

customer_reviews.title: Really nice egg beater
customer_reviews.text: I like this egg beater very much. It is sturdy, smooth to use and relatively easy to clean. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Cyndal E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Snaps apart for easy cleaning. The only thing that could be difficult is having to push button from both sides to snap apart. If you have arthritis it is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: basic, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: although it spins easily, it does not mix/blend all that well.
customer_reviews.author: Neal A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome utensil
customer_reviews.text: I use it to thoroughly beat eggs. It is easy to take apart and clean and easy to grip with my arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Prowse

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold and clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand mixer. I have had others before and this one is so much easier to hold and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Beecher

customer_reviews.title: The best kitchen tool ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have many products by OXO and they all live up to their advertisement. This one is one of the best! Press the order button immediately! No kitchen should be without this incredible too! It will become your favorite too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Biddulph

customer_reviews.title: Handy Tool.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a quick beating of a few eggs. Better than with a fork or whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Zierk

customer_reviews.title: The perfect hand mixer!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, blends great, cleans pretty easily with the mechanism separated. The extra wire rest on the base is the real game changer, so you can touch the bottom of the bowl and keep mixing.
customer_reviews.author: Hoban Washburne

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use & Works Great- OXO products never disappoint us!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to clean, & easy to hold for us seniors! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Great Egg Beater
customer_reviews.text: This is agree at egg beater! I like it a lot. Easy to work.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, large handle and easy to crank.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for an elderly couple. They loved it! Light weight, large handle and easy to crank. Recommended for light mixing.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Tester

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritic hands!
customer_reviews.text: This little beater has lots of power and speed with minimal effort. I wasn’t sure I was going to like the handle, but it’s so comfortable. This is a great beater if you have arthritis! It’s very easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: WomanofSteel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought to have my child help cook. It’s very good for eggs but is a little tough for doughs. Very easy to clean. The grip is great
customer_reviews.author: Anna Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product met my expectations. I have arthritis in my hands and this egg beater is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Nance

customer_reviews.title: High Performance Hand Blender
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hand beater 3 months ago and loved it from the first use. Easy to use, easy to clean, performs well enough to replace electric mixers. It passed the ultimate test - egg whites. This is a serious tool for serious cooks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Taking the beaters out to clean is a great idea. Unfortunately, the plastic keeping the beaters in place doesn't hold up to repeated use. After a while, it will crack and the beaters will fall out mid-use.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Knight

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Loving the way it comes apart for easy cleaning. And it's a lot more sturdier than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. Need to get used to the cooperation of both hands.
customer_reviews.author: SAVESUN

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Perfect for young children's hands too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hong

customer_reviews.title: Better Eggbeater
customer_reviews.text: liked this for cleaning, this item was bought for our camper, works as promised
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Raney

customer_reviews.title: The Worst So Called Egg Beater. Sad!
customer_reviews.text: Nice in concept but pretty bad in practice. As with other reviewers, I found that this "dishwasher safe" egg beater could not withstand the rigors of being washed in the heat of the dishwasher. It shrank. And the whisks fell off and can't stay on, not that it would matter if they could because the two plastic parts no longer fit with each other. Because one part shrank. This is a great beater as long as you hand wash it every time and never once forget to keep it out of the dishwasher. Because it will shrink. Can't even be repurposed as a bath toy like one other unfortunate reviewer was able to do. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Makes life easier. I bake a lot and good use for eggs
customer_reviews.author: kaylan

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: The beater works fine although much of it is made of plastic which makes me question the longevity of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Buckskin Bottoms

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a year
customer_reviews.text: This beater was unbeatable for a year but then broke during normal use (making pancake batter) - plastic construction was not durable.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think I would have the same issues others were ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I would have the same issues others were having with this. Thought they may have been excessively rough with it... But alas, after a few months, snap, it broke in the same place it seems everyone else's had broken. Oh well, out with the plastic primers/glue, repaired it, will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Watson

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: It was what I hoped for. Grip makes it steady to hold for great results,
customer_reviews.author: Judith C.

customer_reviews.title: Dish Washer Safe?
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. Everything is great about it, except it's supposed to be dishwasher safe. Our first one melted in the bottom rack when accidently used heated dry. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Just beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my father. He seems to like.
customer_reviews.author: Superman_mpls

customer_reviews.title: What a time saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Your scrambled eggs will never taste better.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Bax

customer_reviews.title: Another great Oxo product
customer_reviews.text: We've had 2 of these now (1 for us and 1 for our son) - they are excellent for mixing eggs, etc. Our older one works and looks brand new. We love Oxo brand products - never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: egg beater
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. lightweight and the handle comes off so you can just throw the beaters in the dishwasher. Good product. Most of all the OXO products are great.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Awes

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Egg Beater, Standard Packaging
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingOld-fashioned egg beaters have long been relied on for perfectly aerated egg whites and fluffy whipped cream. Now the OXO Good Grips Egg Beater combines the same dependable results with innovation and ease. The smoothly rotating gears are enclosed in the upright handle for protection and easy clean-up. The turning knob and contoured handle have a soft, comfortable, non-slip grip for easy operation even with wet hands. The two stainless steel Beaters can be removed for individual cleaning or to offer a taste of whipped confections. The base detaches by simply pressing two side buttons and can be tossed into the dishwasher. A stainless steel bridge extends slightly longer than the Beaters to rest against the bottom of the mixing bowl to reduce arm strain. Eggs, light batters, whipped cream and more are now such a breeze to whip up that even the next generation may want to take a turn.
feature_bullets: Smoothly rotating gears are enclosed for protection and easy clean-up
Soft, comfortable, non-slip grips on turning knob and contoured handle
Beaters are elevated and continue to work while device rests on bottom of bowl
Sturdy stainless steel beaters can be removed for cleaning or for tasting
Base detaches from top and is dishwasher safe

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
